definitions.definition: A disorder of the immune system causing adverse reactions to substances ( allergens ) not harmful to most and marked by the body's production of histamines and associated with atopy , anaphylaxis , and asthma ; any condition of hypersensitivity to a substance.

subdefinitions.definition: Specifically, hypersensitivity of class I in the modern classification thereof: the immunoglobulin E –mediated type.

definitions.definition: An antipathy , as toward a person or activity.
examples: He has an allergy to reality TV .

main_definition: ( medicine , immunology , loosely ) A disorder of the immune system causing adverse reactions to substances ( allergens ) not harmful to most and marked by the body's production of histamines and associated with atopy , anaphylaxis , and asthma ; any condition of hypersensitivity to a substance.
secondary_definitions: ( informal , figuratively ) An antipathy , as toward a person or activity.
